Reviews.Title: Excellent product. Excellent Company
Reviews.Author: Dave "Gadget guy"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product to connect some existing sensors from a Brinks system to a new wireless system that I installed myself. I connected three magnetic door sensors, two glass break sensors and one motion sensor that were previously wired to the Brinks panel. When I had a technical question, I sent an email to their technical support and got an answer back in a few minutes even though it was outside of normal business hours. Everything has been working fine for several weeks. I highly recommend the product and the company.
